      • trainNeuralNetwork

        public void trainNeuralNetwork(java.lang.Double[] input,
                               java.lang.Double[] target,
                               java.lang.Double learningRate)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        trains the neural network off of an input and output
        Parameters:
        input - the input array we want to train it off of
        target - the output array we would like it to generate
        learningRate - the multiplier for the weight correction delta
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any Neural Network exceptions that arise
